org.joone.log
Interface ILogger

All Known Implementing Classes:
JooneLogger, Log4JLogger
public interface ILogger

Interface that defines the public methods of the logger object. To be fully compatible with apache Log4j, its interface derivates from the org.apache.log4j.Category class.

Author:
P.Marrone
